meanings.definition: The action or process of collecting something.
meanings.sent1: Her collections of stamps grew over the years.
meanings.sent2: The museum has a vast collection of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent3: Tom's collection of comic books takes up an entire room!
meanings.sent4: The collections of memories in her mind were like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The collections of seashells on the beach sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A group of things or people gathered together.
meanings.sent1: The collections of students in the auditorium were excited for the assembly.
meanings.sent2: The art gallery displayed a stunning collection of paintings.
meanings.sent3: The collections of birds on the tree branches chirped happily.
meanings.sent4: The collections of stars in the night sky formed beautiful constellations.
meanings.sent5: The collections of colorful flowers in the garden attracted butterflies.
